attributes.action: Ban loud fireworks for public sale
attributes.additional_details:
Protection
- wildlife
- family pets
- children
- adults
- rubbish just randomly dropped and not picked up

Silent fireworks are available ban the noise making ones for the public
attributes.background: Protect wildlife, family pets, and people and children who are affected by fireworks.  They scare and cause damage to wildlife.  Family pets are distressed and so are lots of people.  Just make them silent.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700223
